title: Fast reconstruction-based ROI triggering via anomaly detection in the CYGNO optical TPC
summary: Optical-readout Time Projection Chambers (TPCs) produce megapixel-scale images whose fine-grained topological information is essential for rare-event searches, but whose size challenges real-time data selection.
